content: The Chinese construction company building the unfinished $3.5 billion Baha Mar resort in the Bahamas on Tuesday accused the developer of mismanaging the project's design and not securing adequate financing.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: Chinese firm blames bankruptcy of Bahamas resort on developer

content: July 7 The Chinese construction company building the unfinished $3.5 billion Baha Mar resort in the Bahamas on Tuesday accused the developer of mismanaging the project's design and not securing adequate financing.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Chinese firm blames bankruptcy of Bahamas resort on developer

content: Johnson Controls Inc   the largest U.S. auto parts maker  said it would sell its business that helps corporates manage their real estate energy needs to real estate services firm CBRE Group Inc  for $1.48 billion in cash.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: CBRE to buy Johnson Controls' workplace solutions for $1.48 billion

content: March 31 Johnson Controls Inc  the largest U.S. auto parts maker  said it would sell its business that helps corporates manage their real estate energy needs to real estate services firm CBRE Group Inc for $1.48 billion in cash.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: UPDATE 1-CBRE to buy Johnson Controls' workplace solutions for $1.48 bln

content: March 31 Johnson Controls Inc  a maker of climate control systems for buildings  said it would sell its global workplace solutions business to CBRE Group Inc  for $1.48 billion in cash.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: REFILE-CBRE to buy Johnson Controls' workplace solutions for $1.48 bln

content: March 6 The following corporate finance-related stories were reported by media:
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Market Chatter -Corporate finance press digest

content: CBRE Group Inc   the world's largest commercial real estate services firm  is in talks to acquire Johnson Controls Inc's  global workplace solutions business for more than $1 billion  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: CBRE seeks to buy Johnson Controls' workplace solutions: sources

content: March 5 CBRE Group Inc  the world's largest commercial real estate services firm  is in talks to acquire Johnson Controls Inc's global workplace solutions business for more than $1 billion  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: CBRE Group Inc
title: CBRE seeks to buy Johnson Controls' workplace solutions -sources
